Posts.Content: Hi I'am in the same situation as yourself & have been since July 2009, have had the same treatment & am now having tests to see if the cancer has spread to my lungs, As you say it is just one kick in the teeth after another, I know it is of no help to you but you are not on your own, (I though I was) but we can't let the bastard beat us !!!! Regards Helen
Posts.Title: Triple Postive Result
